title: Rebirth
description: After a journey through time and space and a nightmarish world, two young boys come home to find themselves under a new world order. The place they left behind has changed. A new threat has started to rise, and things look bleak, hopeless. In Rebirth, the final chapter of The CORT Chronicles, Andy and Zack hope to alter the future by saving the present. After twenty years, David D. Bernstein brings his sci-fi/fantasy trilogy to a close with a thrilling escape from our reality-into an alternate one where good eventually rises again.
author: David D. Bernstein
